name: VIRTUAL SOLDIERS
description:
"Virtual Soldiers" is a lightgun rail shooter game similar to classics in the genre like "Virtua Cop", "House of the Dead", "Area 51", "Time Crisis". Jack in virtually and become Soldiers fighting Nazi's from another timeline who are invading Earth.

- Play 1 Player or 2 Player Offline Co-Op
- 6 Unique Levels with Destructible Environments
- 6 Different Weapons
- 6 Bosses with Special Attacks
